price: E, quanto aos que renegam a Fé e desmentem Nossos sinais e o deparar da Derradeira Vida, esses serão trazidos ao castigo.
arabic: وَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَكَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا وَلِقَآيِٕ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ فِي ٱلۡعَذَابِ مُحۡضَرُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: wa-ammā alladhīna kafarū wakadhabū biāyātinā waliqāi al-ākhirati fa-ulāika fī al-ʿadhābi muḥ'ḍarūna
